title: Understanding the Problem Statement
text: Consider what it means to have a 'one-size-fits-all' rule. Think about the diversity of data architectures and how they might require different approaches.

title: Exploring Data Inventory Depth
text: Reflect on why different data stacks might need varying levels of depth in their data inventory. What factors could influence this need?

title: Consider the Variability in Data Stacks
text: Think about the different components that make up a data stack. How might these components differ from one organization to another?

title: Analyzing the Statement
text: Given the diversity in data architectures, is it reasonable to have a universal rule for data inventory depth?
